greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of e^2.
comment: Also where x^(1/sqrt(x)) is a maximum. - _Robert G. Wilson v_, Oct 22 2014
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
program: (PARI) default(realprecision, 20080); x=exp(2); for (n=1, 20000, d=floor(x); x=(x-d)*10; write("b072334.txt", n, " ", d)); \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Apr 30 2009
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jul 15 2002
